li.span: All students are entitled to a physically and emotionally safe learning environment.
In providing a relevant and rigorous learning experience.
In creating supportive relationships among students, family, staff and community.
In using data and other pertinent information for decision making.
In fostering critical thinking, problem solving and inquiry to prepare our students for the future.
It is our responsibility to inspire and challenge all students to reach their full potential.

span.a: Click here for the School Board Agenda for the April 20, 2020 meeting.

div.p:
Welcome to the Underwood School District, the proud home of the Rockets!!
Our mission continues to have a strong focus on “Preparing students to contribute to and thrive in an ever-changing world through relevant and engaged learning within a supportive community”. We continue to strive for educational excellence through providing a safe, respectful and nurturing learning environment for all students. The school district has a rich tradition of providing strong educational opportunities for all learners. Smaller class sizes in our K-12 school continue to support a positive learning environment where teachers are able to build strong relationships with their students to help them grow academically, emotionally, socially and physically. A strong reading intervention program is in place at the elementary level to support all learners. The majority of our high school students take advantage of the opportunity of starting a college transcript by earning college credits, via 27 different college course offerings that are available in-house or online. Our students continue to excel in a wide variety of extra-curricular activities in the areas of music, drama, academic clubs and sports. The school district is proud of their strong graduation rates, which average around 97%. U.S. News & World Report has recognized Underwood High School for ELEVEN straight years as being one of the “Best High Schools in MN”.
